item.title: Github Action Tips
item.description: how to debug events - name: debig GitHub context env: GITHUB_CONTEXT: ${{ toJson(github) }} run: | echo "$GITHUB_CONTEXT" - name: debig GitHub context run: cat /home/runner/work/_temp/_github_workflow/event.json how to run build steps with own custom container Sometimes you have to run integration tests with own container which contains all devel-dependecies you need. Something crazy like this: name: Pull Request Workflow on: ... env: ... jobs: own-container-jobs: runs-on: ubuntu-latest container: docker.
